What is Azure?: What are the main components of Azure?

Microsoft's cloud computing platform and: A virtualized computing resource running on Azure
A scalable object storage service for unstructured data
A platform-as-a-service (PaaS) offering for building web and mobile apps
A serverless computing service for running event-triggered code
A managed relational database service for Azure
A globally distributed, multi-model database service

What is Azure?: What is Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)?
Microsoft's cloud computing platform and: Microsoft's cloud-based identity and access management service
A set of development tools and services for planning, building, and deploying applications
A managed container orchestration service for deploying and managing containers
A serverless compute service that lets you run event-triggered code
A cloud-based service that allows you to create and run automated workflows
A set of APIs and services that enable developers to add AI capabilities to applications
A fully managed service for enabling reliable and secure communication between IoT devices and the cloud
A cloud-based service for building, deploying, and managing machine learning models
A cloud-based data integration service for orchestrating and automating data workflows
A service that provides comprehensive monitoring and diagnostics for Azure resources
A unified security management and advanced threat protection service for Azure
A management framework for deploying, managing, and organizing Azure resources
